mapper.insert: insert into comm ( id, comm_title, comm_con, comm_date) values( #{id}, #{comm_title}, #{comm_con}, now())
mapper.update: update comm set comm_title=#{comm_title} , comm_con=#{comm_con} where comm_no=#{comm_no}
update comm set comm_v_cnt = comm_v_cnt + 1 where comm_no = #{comm_no}
mapper.select: select * from comm order by comm_date desc limit #{start} , #{count}
select * from comm where comm_title like concat('%',#{search},'%') order by comm_date desc limit #{start}, #{count}
select count(*) from comm where comm_title like concat('%',#{search},'%')
